name: Abadia de los Templarios Hotel Termal Villas

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our original reservation for our one-day stay in La Alberca was for the Hotel Doña Teresa. A few days before our arrival, we were informed that “… there was a problem with our reservation and we now were booked at Hotel Abadía De Los Templarios. We looked up this second hotel and saw mixed reviews but did not want to start changing reservations in this small town.
reviews.title: Bring an Air Conditioner and Fly Swatter

reviews.text: Hotel Abadía De Los Templarios is a very large facility with a number of outlaying cottages and a large main building intended to look like a castle of the Knights Templar.
reviews.title: The location was amazing, facilities of the resort very good
